info.title: ID Analyzer
info.description: ID Analyzer provides several different identity verification products, you need to acquire basic knowledge of each product in order to choose the best solution for your application.

documentNumber.description: Unique identifier associated with the document (e.g. Passport No./Driver License No./Card Number etc)
documentNumber.title: documentNumber

personalNumber.description: Unique personal identifier associated with the person within a country (e.g. National ID Number)
personalNumber.title: personalNumber

fullName.description: If the first name and last name cannot be distinguished full name will be returned instead
fullName.title: fullName

firstName_local.description: First name in local language if available
firstName_local.title: firstName_local

lastName_local.description: Last name in local language if available
lastName_local.title: lastName_local

middleName_local.description: Middle name in local language if available
middleName_local.title: middleName_local

fullName_local.description: Full name in local language if available
fullName_local.title: fullName_local

hairColor.description: Hair Color - ANSI D-20 hair color code (3 letters)
hairColor.title: hairColor

eyeColor.description: Eye Color - ANSI D-20 eye color code (3 letters)
eyeColor.title: eyeColor

dob_year.description: Date of birth year in YYYY
dob_year.title: dob_year

expiry.description: Expiry date of document in YYYY/MM/DD
expiry.title: expiry

daysToExpiry.description: Number of days before the document expires
daysToExpiry.title: daysToExpiry

daysFromIssue.description: Number of days since the document was issued
daysFromIssue.title: daysFromIssue

optionalData.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document
optionalData.title: optionalData

optionalData2.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document
optionalData2.title: optionalData2

documentType.description: Type of document: P=Passport, D=Driver's License, I=Identity Card, V=Visa, R=Residence Card, O=Other
documentType.title: documentType

documentSide.description: Side of the document: FRONT, BACK or BIODATA
documentSide.title: documentSide

issuerOrg_iso2.description: Document issued country code in ISO2. (e.g. US)
issuerOrg_iso2.title: issuerOrg_iso2

issuerOrg_iso3.description: Document issued country code in ISO3. (e.g. USA)
issuerOrg_iso3.title: issuerOrg_iso3

nationality_iso2.description: Document holder nationality in ISO2. (e.g. US)
nationality_iso2.title: nationality_iso2

nationality_iso3.description: Document holder nationality in ISO3. (e.g. USA)
nationality_iso3.title: nationality_iso3

internalId.description: Used to identify the unique document ID under ID Analyzer system, same type of document should have the same ID.
internalId.title: internalId

result.description: Contains an array of matched fields and their value.
result.title: result

lastName.description: confidence level of Last name /Family name
lastName.title: lastName

confidence.description: If return_confidence is set to true, a key-value array containing field name and confidence level will be returned. Confidence score is a float between 0 to 1.
confidence.title: confidence

confidence.description: Value between 0 to 1 on how similar the two faces are, 1 being identical.
confidence.title: confidence

error_message.description: Error message. Example: Could not find face data within facial image
error_message.title: error_message

face.description: If a biometric verification request was submitted, an array will be returned.
face.title: face

passed.description: If document has passed all verifications, will return true. If document has failed at least one verification type, will return false.
passed.title: passed

face.description: If biometric verification is enabled, whether similarity confidence score is above set threshold.
face.title: face

notexpired.description: Whether the document has not yet expired.
notexpired.title: notexpired

name.description: Whether supplied name matched with the name parsed from ID.
name.title: name

dob.description: Whether supplied birthday matched with the birthday parsed from ID.
dob.title: dob

documentNumber.description: Whether supplied document number matched with document number parsed from ID.
documentNumber.title: documentNumber

postcode.description: Whether supplied postcode matched with the postcode parsed from ID.
postcode.title: postcode

address.description: Whether supplied address matched with the address parsed from ID.
address.title: address

checkdigit.description: If the type of document has a check digit/soundex algorithm, whether the check digits are valid.
checkdigit.title: checkdigit

age.description: Whether document holder is within the set age range.
age.title: age

cccode.description: If the type of document has Chinese commercial code (CC code) implementation, whether the CC codes are valid.
cccode.title: cccode

result.description: Array containing result boolean for individual verification.
result.title: reault

verification.description: If any of the verification parameters were submitted, an array will be returned.
verification.title: verification

score.description: The score will be a float between 0 to 1. Valid documents will have a score closer to 1 while fake or edited documents will have a score closer to 0. It is your discretion to decide the boundary, a good starting point would be rejecting score less than 0.5
score.title: score

data_visibility.description: Check if document number, firstname, lastname and birthday are clearly visible.
data_visibility.title: data_visibility

image_quality.description: Check if the image appears to be a high quality image taken directly from camera without cropping or resizing.
image_quality.title: image_quality

feature_referencing.description: Check features and details of submitted document with a genuine document reference.
feature_referencing.title: feature_referencing

exif_check.description: Check if the image has been edited in photo editing software.
exif_check.title: exif_check

publicity_check.description: Check if the document can be obtained from a public domain such as the internet.
publicity_check.title: publicity_check

text_analysis.description: Check if the text present in the document has been tampered.
text_analysis.title: text_analysis

biometric_analysis.description: Check biometric features of the document.
biometric_analysis.title: biometric_analysis

security_feature_check.description: Check if watermark, hologram, laser engraving are present on the document.
security_feature_check.title: security_feature_check

recapture_check.description: Check if the document is a recaptured image from a screen.
recapture_check.title: recapture_check

breakdown.description: Returns details about each checks performed and their results.
breakdown.title: breakdown

warning.description: Array of string containing warning messages about validity of the document.
warning.title: warning

authentication.description: If authenticate is set to true, the document will be validated and an array will be returned.
authentication.title: authentication

alias.description: Alternative or foreign name(s) of the entity
alias.title: alias

dob.description: Peron's birthday, could come in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD formats.
dob.title: dob

address.description: Address or residing country of the entity
address.title: address

nationality.description: Country or nationality of the entity
nationality.title: nationality

type.description: P = Passport number, I = ID number, D = Driving license number, O = Other/Unknown document type
type.title: type

documentnumber.description: A list of documents associated with the entity.
documentnumber.title: documentnumber

time.description: UTC TZ timestamp when entity was added to the source list or last updated
time.title: time

status.description: Position/title of the entity or current status of the sanction
status.title: status

source.description: A list of official source URL(s)
source.title: source

aml.description: Array containing list of AML matches, returns an empty array if no match was found. For specific details refer to AML API Reference.
aml.title: aml

error.description: In case the contract failed to generate, this field will contain reason such as "Invalid contract template ID".
error.title: error

contract.description: If a template ID is set through contract_generate, an autofilled document will be generated.
contract.title: contract

vaultid.description: Unique identifier to the vault entry if vault_save is enabled.
vaultid.title: vaultid

matchrate.description: The ratio of fields successfully recognized by the API, a low ratio would indicate the document image is too blurry.
matchrate.title: matchrate

output.description: If outputimage is set to true and outputmode is url, this field will include an URL (or an array of URLs for dualside scan) pointing to the cropped document image. The link is only guaranteed to live for 600 seconds, and will be removed any time after.
output.title: output

outputface.description: If outputface is set to true and outputmode is url, this field will include an URL pointing to the cropped face image. The link is only guaranteed to live for 600 seconds, and will be removed any time after.
outputface.title: outputface

cropped.description: If outputimage is set to true and outputmode is base64, this field will include a base64-encoded image (or an array of base64-encoded images for dualside scan) of cropped document in JPEG format
cropped.title: cropped

croppedface.description: If outputface is set to true and outputmode is base64, this field will include a base64-encoded image of cropped face region of the document in JPEG format
croppedface.title: croppedface

executionTime.description: Time taken for the API operation in seconds.
executionTime.title: executionTime

responseID.description: A unique identifier to identify the request/response.
responseID.title: responseID

quota.description: Remaining API quota, resets at beginning of each month for free or yearly subscriber, or at start of each billing cycle for monthly subscriber. If you have a subscription plan, your monthly quota will be used before your credit.
quota.title: quota

credit.description: Remaining test credit for your account. If you have a subscription plan, your monthly quota will be used before your credit.
credit.title: credit

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.

executionTime.description: Time taken for the API operation in seconds.
executionTime.title: executionTime

responseID.description: A unique identifier to identify the request/response.
responseID.title: responseID

post.description: Multi-function ID verification API to verify remote physical document, its authenticity and face match the document with your user photo.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your web portal.
apikey.title: apikey

file_base64.description: You can upload a base64-encoded image as a string using application/x-www-form-urlencoded or application/json.
file_base64.title: file_base64

url.description: Core API is capable of downloading remote image from your server.
url.title: url

file_back_base64.description: Base64-encoded image of the back of the document to perform a dual-side scan.
file_back_base64.title: file_back_base64

url_back.description: Remote image of the back of the document to perform a dual-side scan.
url_back.title: url_back

face_base64.description: Base64-encoded image of a person's face to perform photo biometric verification.
face_base64.title: face_base64

faceurl.description: Remote image of of a person's face to perform photo biometric verification.
faceurl.title: faceurl

video_base64.description: Base64-encoded selfie video to perform video biometric verification.
video_base64.title: video_base64

videourl.description: Remote hosted selfie video to perform video biometric verification.
videourl.title: videourl

accuracy.description: Configure the speed and accuracy of document recognition and ocr results. Low accuracy will reduce response time to under 1 second while high accuracy will generally takes 2~3 seconds.
accuracy.title: accuracy

authenticate.description: Validate the document to check whether the document is authentic and has not been tampered.
authenticate.title: authenticate

authenticate_module.description: Specify module used for validating the document.
authenticate_module.title: authenticate_module

biometric_threshold.description: Specify the minimum score to pass facial biometric verification
biometric_threshold.title: biometric_threshold

return_confidence.description: Return confidence score for each data field.
return_confidence.title: return_confidence

return_empty.description: You can get the API to return null on empty fields by enabling this parameter.
return_empty.title: return_empty

outputimage.description: Produce a cropped image of the document.
outputimage.title: outputimage

outputface.description: Produce a cropped image of the face region on the document.
outputface.title: outputface

outputmode.description: Output the cropped document and face as either URL or base64-encoded content.
outputmode.title: outputmode

dualsidecheck.description: Check if the names, document number and document type matches between the front and the back of the document when performing dual-side scan. If any information mismatches error 14 will be thrown.
dualsidecheck.title: dualsidecheck

verify_expiry.description: Check if the document is still valid based on its expiry date.
verify_expiry.title: verify_expiry

verify_documentno.description: Check if supplied document number matches with document.
verify_documentno.title: verify_documentno

verify_dob.description: Check if supplied date of birth matches with document. (YYYY/MM/DD)
verify_dob.title: verify_dob

verify_age.description: Check if the document holder is aged between the given range. (range, example: 18-40)
verify_age.title: verify_age

verify_address.description: Check if supplied address matches with document.
verify_address.title: verify_address

verify_postcode.description: Check if supplied postcode matches with document.
verify_postcode.title: verify_postcode

country.description: Check if the document was issued by specified countries, if not error code 10 will be thrown. Separate multiple values with comma. For example "US,CA" would accept documents from United States and Canada.
country.title: country

region.description: Check if the document was issued by specified state, if not error code 11 will be thrown. Separate multiple values with comma. For example "CA,TX" would accept documents from California and Texas.
region.title: region

type.description: Check if the document was one of the specified types, if not error code 12 will be thrown. For example "PD" would accept both passport and drivers license.
type.title: type

checkblocklist.description: Check the document data against blocked entries in your vault. If the document matches one of the blocked entry error 15 will be thrown
checkblocklist.title: checkblocklist

vault_save.description: Save document image and parsed information in your secured vault. You can list, search and update document entries in your vault through Vault API or web portal.
vault_save.title: vault_save

vault_saveunrecognized.description: Save document image in your vault even if the document cannot be recognized.
vault_saveunrecognized.title: vault_saveunrecognized

vault_noduplicate.description: Prevent duplicated images from being saved.
vault_noduplicate.title: vault_noduplicate

vault_automerge.description: Automatically merge images with same document number into a single entry inside vault.
vault_automerge.title: vault_automerge

vault_customdata1.description: Add up to 5 custom strings that will be associated with the vault entry, this can be useful for filtering and searching entries.
vault_customdata1.title: vault_customdata1

vault_customdata2.description: Add up to 5 custom strings that will be associated with the vault entry, this can be useful for filtering and searching entries.
vault_customdata2.title: vault_customdata2

vault_customdata3.description: Add up to 5 custom strings that will be associated with the vault entry, this can be useful for filtering and searching entries.
vault_customdata3.title: vault_customdata3

vault_customdata4.description: Add up to 5 custom strings that will be associated with the vault entry, this can be useful for filtering and searching entries.
vault_customdata4.title: vault_customdata4

vault_customdata5.description: Add up to 5 custom strings that will be associated with the vault entry, this can be useful for filtering and searching entries.
vault_customdata5.title: vault_customdata5

aml_check.description: Check document holder's name and document number against ID Analyzer AML Database.
aml_check.title: aml_check

aml_database.description: Separate each database code with comma, for example: un_sc,us_ofac.
aml_database.title: aml_database

aml_strict_match.description: Enable this parameter to reduce false-positives by only matching entities with exact same nationality and birthday.
aml_strict_match.title: aml_strict_match

contract_generate.description: Contract template ID to autofill with user data.
contract_generate.title: contract_generate

contract_format.description: Output document format. Optionals: PDF, DOCX, HTML.
contract_format.title: contract_format

createtime.description: Timestamp of entry creation in UTC
createtime.title: createtime

updatetime.description: Timestamp of last modification in UTC
updatetime.title: updatetime

trustlevel.description: This score is calculated automatically if authentication is enabled. (0: Undetermined, 1: Invalid document, 2: Suspicious, 3: Valid)
trustlevel.title: trustlevel

docupass_success.description: 0 or 1, whether the DocuPass verification succeeded or failed.
docupass_success.title: docupass_success

docupass_failedreason.description: If DocuPass verification has failed, the reason why it failed.
docupass_failedreason.title: docupass_failedreason

docupass_customid.description: customid passed when creating DocuPass verification.
docupass_customid.title: docupass_customid

documentNumber.description: The unique identifier of the document (Passport No./Driver License No. etc)
documentNumber.title: documentNumber

documentNumber_formatted.description: Automatically generated string of documentNumber without any symbols, this field is useful for filtering results.
documentNumber_formatted.title: documentNumber_formatted

personalNumber.description: A secondary identifier number on the document
personalNumber.title: personalNumber

fullName.description: Full name (Updating other name fields will not update fullName)
fullName.title: fullName

sex.description: M: Male, F: Female, X: Unspecified
sex.title: sex

documentType.description: P: Passport, D: Driver's License, I: Identity Card, V: Visa, R: Residence Card, O: Other
documentType.title: documentType

vehicleClass.description: Class of vehicles on driver's license
vehicleClass.title: vehicleClass

issuerOrg_region_abbr.description: Document issuer subregion/state abbreviation. Example: CA
issuerOrg_region_abbr.title: issuerOrg_region_abbr

issuerOrg_iso2.description: Document issued country code in ISO2. Example: US
issuerOrg_iso2.title: issuerOrg_iso2

nationality_iso2.description: Document holder nationality in ISO2. Example: US
nationality_iso2.title: nationality_iso2

optionalData.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document
optionalData.title: optionalData

optionalData2.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document
optionalData2.title: optionalData2

customdata1.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry
customdata1.title: customdata1

customdata2.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry
customdata2.title: customdata2

customdata3.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry
customdata3.title: customdata3

customdata4.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry
customdata4.title: customdata4

customdata5.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry
customdata5.title: customdata5

block.description: Set this parameter to block the same document from being submitted to Core API or DocuPass.
block.title: block

contract.description: Link to contract or legal documents generated/signed using Core API or DocuPass
contract.title: contract

createtime.description: Time image was uploaded in UTC
createtime.title: createtime

image.description: Contains a list of images associated with the entry.
image.title: image

data.description: Check below for a list of fields contained in a vault entry. Note that a document may not contain information for every fields, hence some of the field value will be null.
data.title: data

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: When entries are added to the vault, both Core API and DocuPass API will return a vault entry identifier named vaultid. You can use the identifier to query the content of an entry in the vault by submitting an HTTP POST request to the following endpoint.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

nextoffset.description: Offset value for the next set of data. If the current set of data is the final set of data, this field will not be returned.
nextoffset.title: nextoffset

items.description: An array of entries found and their full content, identical to the contents returned by GET method.
items.title: items

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: To list all the entries stored inside the vault or search for entries with specific values, send an HTTP POST request to the following endpoint.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

orderby.description: Name of the field used to order the result.
orderby.title: orderby

sort.description: ASC to sort results in ascending order, DESC to sort in descending order.
sort.title: sort

limit.description: Number of vault entries to return. (1 to 100)
limit.title: limit

offset.description: Return list starting at a specific entry, for example, when limit=10, to access the third page of the results, use offset=20
offset.title: offset

items.description: To filter/search entries you need to construct filter statements and put them in an array, you can have 5 filter stataments per request
items.title: filter

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can update the value of a single field or values of multiple fields in a vault entry by making HTTP POST request.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

block.description: Set this parameter to block the same document from being submitted to Core API or DocuPass. 0: No block 1: Block document number 2: Block firstname/lastname 3: Block both document number and firstname/lastname.
block.title: block

customdata1.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry.
customdata1.title: customdata1

customdata2.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry.
customdata2.title: customdata2

customdata3.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry.
customdata3.title: customdata3

customdata4.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry.
customdata4.title: customdata4

customdata5.description: 5 custom strings that can be used to add custom memo to the entry.
customdata5.title: customdata5

documentNumber.description: The unique identifier of the document (Passport No./Driver License No. etc)
documentNumber.title: documentNumber

documentType.description: P: Passport D: Driver's License I: Identity Card V: Visa R: Residence Card O: Other
documentType.title: documentType

docupass_customid.description: customid passed when creating DocuPass verification.
docupass_customid.title: docupass_customid

docupass_failedreason.description: If DocuPass verification has failed, the reason why it failed.
docupass_failedreason.title: docupass_failedreason

docupass_success.description: 0 or 1, whether the DocuPass verification succeeded or failed.
docupass_success.title: docupass_success

fullName.description: Full name (Updating other name fields will not update fullName)
fullName.title: fullName

issuerOrg_iso2.description: Document issued country code in ISO2. Example: US
issuerOrg_iso2.title: issuerOrg_iso2

issuerOrg_region_abbr.description: Document issuer subregion/state abbreviation. Example: CA
issuerOrg_region_abbr.title: issuerOrg_region_abbr

nationality_iso2.description: Document holder nationality in ISO2. Example: US
nationality_iso2.title: nationality_iso2

optionalData.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document.
optionalData.title: optionalData

optionalData2.description: Extra unspecific data included in the document.
optionalData2.title: optionalData2

personalNumber.description: A secondary identifier number on the document.
personalNumber.title: personalNumber

sex.description: M: Male F: Female X: Unspecified
sex.title: sex

trustlevel.description: 0: Undetermined 1: Invalid document 2: Suspicious 3: Valid  This score is calculated automatically if authentication is enabled.
trustlevel.title: trustlevel

vehicleClass.description: Class of vehicles on driver's license.
vehicleClass.title: vehicleClass

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can delete single or multiple vault entries by making HTTP POST request.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

items.title: id
items.description: Vault entry identifier(s) to delete (String or Array of Strings).

createtime.description: Time image was uploaded in UTC
createtime.title: createtime

image.description: Contains a list of images associated with the entry.
image.title: image

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can upload an image and add it to an existing vault entry by making HTTP POST request.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

id.description: Vault entry identifier to add image to
id.title: id

type.description: Set the type of image: 0=document and 1=person
type.title: type

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can delete an image inside a vault entry by making HTTP POST request. Note that after an image is deleted, the URL to the image may still be accessible for a short-period of time due to caching.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

id.description: Vault entry identifier containing the image.
id.title: id

imageid.description: id of the image to delete.
imageid.title: imageid

items.description: If matching entries are found, a list of documents with full contents will be returned similar to the list command.
items.title: items

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: Face search allows you to search the entire vault using an image of a person. To use face search feature, you must enable face search indexing under web portal, and train your vault datasets periodically.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

maxentry.description: Number of matching entries to be returned, between 1 to 10.
maxentry.title: maxentry

threshold.description: Set minimum face similarity score required, in the range of 0 to 1.
threshold.title: threshold

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: Before performing face search, you must issue a train command to train the document datasets inside your vault. You may also train your vault data through web portal.  The training task is asynchronous, training time depends on the number of vault entries and images. It could take from several seconds to an hour.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

status.description: nottrained: Never trained, notstarted: Training is not running, running: Training is currently running, succeeded: Training succeeded, failed: Training failed
status.title: status

startTime.description: Time when last training was started in UTC.
startTime.title: startTime

statusChangeTime.description: Time for last status change in UTC.
statusChangeTime.title: statusChangeTime

lastSuccessTime.description: Time for last successful training in UTC.
lastSuccessTime.title: lastSuccessTime

error.description: Error message associated with failed training status.
error.title: error

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: Check whether vault training is still ongoing or has completed.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your Web Portal.
apikey.title: apikey

reference.description: A unique reference code for the DocuPass session.
reference.title: reference

customid.description: Custom ID used when creating DocuPass session.
customid.title: customid

url.description: Unique URL to DocuPass web app. Send this link to your user, or embed it into your website or mobile app to begin identity verification.
url.title: url

qrcode.description: QR code image URL for your user to scan
qrcode.title: qrcode

base_url.description: You may send this link to your user and ask them to enter reference code to start verification.
base_url.title: base_url

html.description: Sample HTML that you can insert into your webpage.
html.title: html

smssent.description: Contains the phone number as confirmation when SMS has been successfully sent via sms_verification_link parameter.
smssent.title: smssent

expiry.description: UTC UNIX timestamp indicating when this session will expire, upon expiry, user will no longer be able to use the link and a failed callback will be sent.
expiry.title: expiry

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can create a verification session for every user requiring identity verification.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your web portal.
apikey.title: apikey

type.description: 0: Iframe Module ,1: Mobile Module, 2: Redirection Module, 3: Live Mobile Module
type.title: type

callbackurl.description: Webhook/Callback URL to receive verification result.
callbackurl.title: callbackurl

biometric.description: Ask user to take a selfie photo or selfie video for face verification.
biometric.title: biometric

biometric_threshold.description: Specify the minimum score to pass facial biometric verification
biometric_threshold.title: biometric_threshold

authenticate_minscore.description: Document must meet minimum authenticity score to pass validation. Set 0 to disable validity/authenticity check.
authenticate_minscore.title: authenticate_minscore

authenticate_module.description: Specify module used for validating the document.
authenticate_module.title: authenticate_module

maxattempt.description: The number of maximum fail attempts for each verification request.
maxattempt.title: maxattempt

successredir.description: Browser will be redirected to this URL when identity verification succeeds.
successredir.title: successredir

failredir.description: Browser will be redirected to this URL when identity verification failed.
failredir.title: failredir

customid.description: It is useful for identifying your user within your database. This value will be stored under docupass_customid under Vault.
customid.title: customid

reusable.description: Enabling this parameter will allow multiple users to verify their identity through the same URL, a new DocuPass reference code will be generated for each user automatically.
reusable.title: reusable

phoneverification.description: Whether to ask user to enter a phone number for verification, DocuPass supports both mobile or landline number verification. (Subscriber Only)
phoneverification.title: phoneverification

documenttype.description: User must upload a specific type of document. For example "PD" would accept both passport and drivers license.
documenttype.title: documenttype

dualsidecheck.description: Check if the names, document number and document type matches between the front and the back of the document when performing dual-side scan. If any information mismatches error 14 will be thrown.
dualsidecheck.title: dualsidecheck

verify_expiry.description: Only accept document that has not expired
verify_expiry.title: verify_expiry

verify_name.description: Full name including first name and last name requiring verification.
verify_name.title: verify_name

verify_dob.description: Date of birth requiring verification, in YYYY/MM/DD format.
verify_dob.title: verify_dob

vault_save.description: Save user documents and parsed information into vault.
vault_save.title: vault_save

return_documentimage.description: Return document image uploaded by user in the callback request.
return_documentimage.title: return_documentimage

return_faceimage.description: Return face image uploaded by user in the callback request.
return_faceimage.title: return_faceimage

return_type.description: Specify the type of image being returned, either base64-encoded image content or an URL to the image. (URL to image will be kept for only 7 days)
return_type.title: return_type

welcomemessage.description: Replace generic greeting message on the first page with your customized text (max 1,000 characters)
welcomemessage.title: welcomemessage

nobranding.description: Hide branding logo on all DocuPass pages. (Subscriber Only)
nobranding.title: nobranding

customhtmlurl.description: Use your own HTML page and CSS for DocuPass. (Subscriber Only)
customhtmlurl.title: customhtmlurl

language.description: DocuPass automatically detects user device language and displays corresponding language.
language.title: language

expiry.description: Number of seconds before DocuPass session expires. Upon expiry, user will not be able to continue with the current session, a failed callback will also be sent.
expiry.title: expiry

qr_color.description: Color of the QR Code Foreground. (Only for Live Mobile and Standard Mobile)
qr_color.title: qr_color

qr_bgcolor.description: Color of the QR Code Background. (Only for Live Mobile and Standard Mobile)
qr_bgcolor.title: qr_bgcolor

qr_size.description: Size of QR Code(1-50). (Only for Live Mobile and Standard Mobile)
qr_size.title: qr_size

qr_margin.description: Border thickness of QR Code(1-50). (Only for Live Mobile and Standard Mobile)
qr_margin.title: qr_margin

reference.description: Reference code for the DocuPass session
reference.title: reference

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: To make sure the data was sent from our server.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your web portal.
apikey.title: apikey

reference.description: Reference code received in POST BODY.
reference.title: reference

alias.description: Alternative or foreign name(s) of the entity
alias.title: alias

dob.description: Peron's birthday, could come in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD formats.
dob.title: dob

address.description: Address or residing country of the entity
address.title: address

nationality.description: Country or nationality of the entity
nationality.title: nationality

type.description: P = Passport number, I = ID number, D = Driving license number, O = Other/Unknown document type
type.title: type

documentnumber.description: A list of documents associated with the entity.
documentnumber.title: documentnumber

time.description: UTC TZ timestamp when entity was added to the source list or last updated
time.title: time

status.description: Position/title of the entity or current status of the sanction
status.title: status

source.description: A list of official source URL(s)
source.title: source

items.description: Array containing list of AML matches, returns an empty array if no match was found. For specific details refer to AML API Reference.
items.title: aml

post.description: AML API allows you to search ID Analyzer global AML database for sanctions, PEPs and wanted criminals using either a name, document number or both. You may further filter the results with birthday and nationality.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your web portal.
apikey.title: apikey

name.description: Person or organization's name or alias in any language.
name.title: name

documentnumber.description: Person's passport number, national ID number or driving license number etc.
documentnumber.title: documentnumber

entity.description: person: Person; legalentity: Company or Organization
entity.title: entity

country.description: Return only entities with matching country/nationality or no country information.
country.title: country

dob.description: Return only entities with matching birthday or no birthday information.
dob.title: dob

database.description: Specify the source databases to perform AML check, if left blank, all source databases will be checked. Separate each database code with comma, for example: un_sc,us_ofac. For full list of source databases and corresponding code visit AML API Overview.
database.title: database

reference.description: A unique reference code for the DocuPass session.
reference.title: reference

customid.description: Custom ID used when creating DocuPass session.
customid.title: customid

url.description: Unique URL to DocuPass web app. Send this link to your user, or embed it into your website or mobile app to review and sign document.
url.title: url

qrcode.description: QR code image URL for your user to scan
qrcode.title: qrcode

base_url.description: You may send this link to your user and ask them to enter reference code to sign documents.
base_url.title: base_url

html_qrcode.description: Sample HTML to display QR Code on your webpage.
html_qrcode.title: html_qrcode

html_iframe.description: Sample HTML to insert iframe into your webpage.
html_iframe.title: html_iframe

smssent.description: Contains the phone number as confirmation when SMS has been successfully sent via sms_contract_link parameter.
smssent.title: smssent

expiry.description: UTC UNIX timestamp indicating when this session will expire, upon expiry, user will no longer be able to use the link and a failed callback will be sent.
expiry.title: expiry

error.description: This field will only be returned if there was an error, containing the following array.
error.title: error

post.description: You can create a signature session where user will review and e-sign legal document without identity verification. If you want to perform both identity verification and have your user sign some document, please create an identity verification session instead.

apikey.description: Your private API key is available under your web portal.
apikey.title: apikey

companyname.description: Your company name will be displayed throughout verification page so that end-user knows they are submitting identity information to your company
companyname.title: companyname

template_id.description: Contract template ID to autofill with user data.
template_id.title: template_id

contract_prefill_data.description: JSON data in key-value pairs to autofill dynamic fields, data from user ID will be used first in case of a conflict. For example, passing {"myparameter":"abc"} would fill %{myparameter} in contract template with "abc".
contract_prefill_data.title: contract_prefill_data

callbackurl.description: Contract file will be sent to this url. You must either enable vault_save or specify a callbackurl so that you can save the generated document.
callbackurl.title: callbackurl

successredir.description: Browser will be redirected to this URL after the document has been reviewed and signed. DocuPass reference code and customid will be appended to the end of URL
successredir.title: successredir

customid.description: A custom string that will be sent back to your server's callback URL, and appended to redirection URLs set by successredir and failredir as a query string. It is useful for identifying your user within your database. This value will be stored under docupass_customid under Vault.
customid.title: customid

reusable.description: nabling this parameter will allow multiple users to review and sign documents through the same URL, a new DocuPass reference code will be generated for each user automatically.
reusable.title: reusable

vault_save.description: Save generated document into vault. You must either enable vault_save or specify a callbackurl so that you can save generated document.
vault_save.title: vault_save

nobranding.description: Hide branding logo on all DocuPass pages.
nobranding.title: nobranding

customhtmlurl.description: Use your own HTML page and CSS for DocuPass. Once you have made changes to the HTML and CSS you need to upload them to your own server, at the start of each session DocuPass will download the latest HTML page from your server.
customhtmlurl.title: customhtmlurl

language.description: DocuPass automatically detects user device language and displays corresponding language. Set this parameter to override automatic language detection.(en, fr, nl, de, es, zh-TW, zh-CN)
language.title: language

expiry.description: Number of seconds before DocuPass session expires. Upon expiry, user will not be able to continue with the current session, a failed callback will also be sent.
expiry.title: expiry

qr_color.description: Color of the QR Code Foreground
qr_color.title: qr_color

qr_bgcolor.description: Color of the QR Code Background
qr_bgcolor.title: qr_bgcolor
